meanings.sent1: The desert is the dryest place I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were dryest after working in the sun all day.
meanings.sent3: The dryest towel in the house was useless for drying the spilled water.
meanings.sent4: His humor was as dryest as the Sahara desert.
meanings.sent5: The dryest land on Earth is found in certain arid regions.

meanings.sent1: The dryest sponge couldn't absorb any more water.
meanings.sent2: The dryest well in the village had run completely dry.
meanings.sent3: The dryest faucet in the house refused to give even a drop of water.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as dryest as the desert sand.
meanings.sent5: The dryest season in this region brings little rain and parches the land.

meanings.sent1: The lecture was the dryest one I've ever attended.
meanings.sent2: His jokes fell flat, making his performance the dryest of the night.
meanings.sent3: The dryest movie I watched put me to sleep within minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was as dryest as an old history book.
meanings.sent5: The dryest book on the shelf had never been opened due to its uninteresting content.
